verses.verse: <S%H480>Woe<s%> is me! for I am as when they have <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7019>summer<s%> fruits, as the grape <S%H5955>gleanings<s%> of the <S%H1210>vintage:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H811>cluster<s%> to <S%H398>eat:<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desired<s%> the first <S%H1063>ripe<s%> fruit.

The <S%H2623>good<s%> man is <S%H6>perished<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3477>upright<s%> among <S%H120>men:<s%> they <S%H3605>all<s%> lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood;<s%> they <S%H6679>hunt<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> with a <S%H2764>net.<s%>

That they may do <S%H7451>evil<s%> with both <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H3190>earnestly,<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> <S%H7592>asks,<s%> and the <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> for a <S%H7966>reward;<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> man, he <S%H1696>utters<s%> his <S%H1942>mischievous<s%> <S%H5315>desire:<s%> so they <S%H5686>wrap<s%> it up.

The <S%H2896>best<s%> of them is as a <S%H2312>brier:<s%> the most <S%H3477>upright<s%> is sharper than a <S%H4534>thorn<s%> <S%H4534>hedge:<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> and your <S%H6486>visitation<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall be their <S%H3998>perplexity.<s%>

<S%H539>Trust<s%> you not in a <S%H7453>friend,<s%> put you not <S%H982>confidence<s%> in a <S%H441>guide:<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> from her that <S%H7901>lies<s%> in your <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5034>dishonors<s%> the <S%H2>father,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> up against her <S%H517>mother,<s%> the <S%H3618>daughter<s%> in <S%H3618>law<s%> against her <S%H2545>mother<s%> in <S%H2545>law;<s%> a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H341>enemies<s%> are the <S%H582>men<s%> of his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Therefore I will <S%H6822>look<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I will <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation:<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> me.

<S%H8056>Rejoice<s%> not against me, O my <S%H341>enemy:<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H5307>fall,<s%> I shall <S%H6965>arise;<s%> when I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be a <S%H216>light<s%> to me.

I will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2197>indignation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against him, <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>cause,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for me: he will <S%H3318>bring<s%> me <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H216>light,<s%> and I shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Then she that is my <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H955>shame<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> her which <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God?<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> her: <S%H6258>now<s%> shall she be <S%H4823>trodden<s%> down as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that your <S%H1447>walls<s%> are to be <S%H1129>built,<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H2706>decree<s%> be <S%H7368>far<s%> removed.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> also he shall <S%H935>come<s%> even to you from <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and from the <S%H4692>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and from the <S%H4693>fortress<s%> even to the <S%H5104>river,<s%> and from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and from <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>
Notwithstanding the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, for the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

<S%H7462>Feed<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> with your <S%H7626>rod,<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of your <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> which <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>solitarily<s%> in the <S%H3293>wood,<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel:<s%> let them <S%H7462>feed<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>
According to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H3318>coming<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will I <S%H7200>show<s%> to him <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> things.

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and be <S%H954>confounded<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1369>might:<s%> they shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> on their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> their <S%H241>ears<s%> shall be <S%H2790>deaf.<s%>

They shall <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> they shall <S%H7264>move<s%> out of their <S%H4526>holes<s%> like <S%H2119>worms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> they shall be <S%H6342>afraid<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> because of you.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is a <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> to you, that <S%H5375>pardons<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H5674>passes<s%> by the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5159>heritage?<s%> he <S%H2388>retains<s%> not his <S%H639>anger<s%> for <S%H5703>ever,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H2654>delights<s%> in <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>

He will <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> he will have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on us; he will <S%H3533>subdue<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities;<s%> and you will <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

You will <S%H5414>perform<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
